column2: You have started to prepare yourself for going on a pilgrimage to Mecca, home of the Kaaba. Soon you will travel in a group with others to visit the many shrines of the gods.
As you arrive in Mecca to pray to the gods, you see that the water is polluted and therefore unfit to clean oneself with.
In Mecca, you see the many tribes have congregated here to pay their respects to the gods. You leave your weapons behind to comply with the eternal armistice.
You now enter the Kaabah and pray to the gods of Arabia, chief among them Hubal. Many gifts and sacrifices are made to them, so do you.
All gods need my prayers and gifts!
I only need to pray to few gods.
Performing the Sa'i involved running seven times between the hills of Safa and Marwah. This is done to remember the search for water by Ishmael's mother...
column3: Pour réaliser le Sa'iy, il faut effectuer sept allers-retours entres les collines Safa et Marwah. Cette marche vise à commémorer la recherche d'eau dans le désert qu'a effectué la mère d'Ismaël.
column4: Die Ausübung des Sa'i beinhaltet, dass man sieben Mal zwischen den Hügeln von Safa und Marwah hin und her läuft. Dies wird im Gedenken an die Suche von Ishmaels Mutter nach Wasser vollzogen ...
column6: Hacer el Sa'i incluye correr siete veces entre las colinas de Safa y Marwah. Esto se hace para recordar la búsqueda de agua por parte de la madre de Ismael...

column2: You vist Mount Ararat, where many sages and oracles like to mediate. You immerse yourself in prayers and contemplate too.
The gods imparted me with great wisdom and knowledge. I am a changed now and shall rule better.
Allah and his daughters guide me
